app.title: Reaction Test
app.subtitle: Understand and improve your reaction speed, accuracy and cognitive abilities through various professional testing tools
app.footer: Reaction Test - Improve Your Reaction Speed

clickTracker.name: Click Tracker Test
clickTracker.description: Click moving targets as many as possible in 30 seconds
clickTracker.howToPlay: Click moving targets as many as possible in 30 seconds. Targets will move randomly on the screen, testing your hand-eye coordination and reaction speed.

colorChange.name: Color Change Test
colorChange.description: Test your reaction speed to color changes
colorChange.howToPlay: Click immediately when the square turns green. Don't click when it's red, or you'll fail. Test your visual reaction speed.

audioReact.name: Audio Reaction Test
audioReact.description: Click immediately after hearing the sound
audioReact.howToPlay: Click the screen immediately after hearing the beep. Test your auditory reaction speed.

directionReact.name: Direction Reaction Test
directionReact.description: React quickly according to arrow direction
directionReact.howToPlay: Press the corresponding direction key according to the arrow displayed on the screen. React quickly and accurately to challenge your judgment.

numberFlash.name: Number Flash Test
numberFlash.description: Remember and enter the flashing number
numberFlash.howToPlay: Remember the number briefly displayed on the screen. Numbers will flash quickly, testing your instant memory ability.

sequenceMemory.name: Sequence Memory Test
sequenceMemory.description: Remember the order of the sequence
sequenceMemory.howToPlay: Remember the order in which the blocks light up and click them in the same order. The sequence will get longer after each success, challenging your memory limit.

history.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all records? This action cannot be undone.
